document.webtitle: Retail Hell Underground: Scary Customer Scenes
document.description: Coworker: “WHY DON’T YOU LEAVE?!” Awesome ... that was used as a spokes-dog for a fast food restaurant... ... to blow our bank accounts because we love your store ...
